Web.HTML/CSS/JS: Created a number of sites using HTML/CSS/JS, including this one!
Web.Angular: Worked with an Angular frontend during my time as a fullstack developer for Termerity Analytics.
Web.Flask: Used Flask as backend for 'where am I' webapp
Web.Django/Django REST framwork: Worked with the Django REST framwork backend during my time as a fullstack developer for Termerity Analytics.
Web.SQL/PostgreSQL/SQLite: Utilized PostgreSQL during my time as a fullstack developer for Termerity Analytics

Award.UofT Dean’s Scholarships: Awarded to students with 3.5+ GPA with a full course load
Award.UofT Entrance Scholarship ($1.5k): Awarded to applicants with 90+ highschool average
